list.name: Web Application Firewall
list.features: 50 domain names can be protected (number of top-level domain names: 5)  Service bandwidth: 200 Mbit/s (for web applications on HUAWEI CLOUD) 50 Mbit/s (for web applications outside HUAWEI CLOUD) \/ 5,000 QPS of service requests
